vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at Num.34.23;
father of: Hanniel (H2592)
§ Ephod = "a (special) girdle"
the father of a chief of Manasseh
vocabInfos._es_Definition: padre de Haniel; tribu de Manasés
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以弗得 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "(特別的)腰帶"
瑪拿西一族長的父親 (民34:23)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
以弗得 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "(特别的)腰带"
玛拿西一族长的父亲 (民34:23)
